text: SQL injection vulnerability found in user login form. Attacker can bypass authentication using malicious input.
Customer record: John Doe, SSN: 123-45-6789, Email: john@example.com
Unencrypted database connection allows credential interception
Employee directory with names and phone numbers

ddl_statement: CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, ssn VARCHAR(11), email VARCHAR(255), password_hash VARCHAR(64));
